alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 27 at 9:17AM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Mississippi River at Burlington and Gladstone LD18. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Water reaches the tops of the levees at the Henderson Drainage District. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 14.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.2 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
